name: Wrong Target
description:
It's not easy being a DoorDasher. No, not rude customers, not slow restaurants. For Lewis Kamin D. Nami Nader, or LEWD for short, all he wants to do is get the bills paid when the "real job" market is utterly vicious. Maybe in his free time he can find a cute guy and ideally start a relationship.

But alas, the most popular restaurant in LEWD's hometown is Chik-Fil-A, and customers order from there at a clip. LEWD has too many deliveries to make to care about the morals of his customers, and money is money after all.

Of course, the one guy he found in his small town that swung that way just HAPPENS to be a skosh more morally passionate than LEWD can afford to be. So morally passionate, he and his group of lackies apparently never heard the phrase "Don't shoot the messenger."

So now you're in control of LEWD, and you need to deliver food to hungry customers, whilst dodging those who act like he's the problem here.

Use Left and Right while holding SpaceBar to accelerate

OR

Steer with the mouse and hold the left mouse button to accelerate

Make deliveries to get paid, and avoid the kamikaze drivers who clearly have the "wrong target".
